it.polimi.polishare.common.DHT.chord

Interface Node

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote

    public interface Node
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Remote interface representing a chord's node on the network.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      void create()
      Creates a new chord ring containing only this node.

      Executes the given Operation on the element associated with the specified key in the ring's distributed storage.

      void fixFingers()
      Recalculates the node fingers.

      • lookupSuccessor

        Node lookupSuccessor(Key k)
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Query the ring asking for the successor of the given key. A node x is the successor of this key if:
        • k.isRingBetween(x.getPred().getKey(), x.getKey())
        Parameters:
        k - the provided Key.
        Returns:
        the successor of the given key.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

        void create()
     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Creates a new chord ring containing only this node.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • join

   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Entra nell'anello a cui appartiene il nodo passato come parametro.
        Parameters:
        known -
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • stabilize

        void stabilize()
        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Check to see if the next node has a new precedent whose key is bigger than that of this node. In this case it updates the list of successors. Finally it informs the next node of its existence calling rectify(Node).
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • rectify

        void rectify(Node newPred)
      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Check if the candidate is a better predecessor than the current one. If so, update its predecessor.
        Parameters:
        newPred - the new predecessor candidate.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

        Recalculates the node fingers.
        Throws:

      • replicate

        void replicate()
        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Replicates the storage of this node on all the nodes of the successor's list. Replication is used to achieve fault tolerance.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • stop

        void stop()
   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Kill this node.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

                java.util.Map<Key,java.lang.Object> reply)
         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Store on this node the storage of another node.
        Parameters:
        key - the node to which the storage originally belongs
        reply - the actual replicated storage
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getStored

        java.lang.Object getStored(Key k)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns the value to which the specified key is mapped on this node's storage, or null if this map contains no mapping for the key.
        Parameters:
        k - the key whose associated value is to be returned
        Returns:
        Returns the value to which the specified key is mapped on this node's storage, or null if this map contains no mapping for the key.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • putStored

        void putStored(Key k,
               java.lang.Object value)
        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Associates the specified value with the specified key in this node's storage. If the map previously contained a mapping for the key, the old value is replaced by the specified value.
        Parameters:
        k - key with which the specified value is to be associated
        value - value to be associated with the specified key
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • removeStored

        void removeStored(Key k)
           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Removes the mapping for a key from this node's storage if it is present.
        Parameters:
        k - key whose mapping is to be removed from the map.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • execStored

        void execStored(Key k,
                Operation op)
         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Executes the given Operation on the element associated with the specified key in this node's storage. If no association is found, the value null is passed to the Operation.
        Parameters:
        k - key associated to the value on which executes the operation.
        op - the given operation.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • get

        java.lang.Object get(Key k)
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns the value to which the specified key is mapped on the ring's distributed storage, or null if the storage contains no mapping for the key.
        Parameters:
        k - the key whose associated value is to be returned
        Returns:
        Returns the mapped value, or null if the distributed storage contains no mapping for the key.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • get

        java.util.List<java.lang.Object> get(java.util.function.Predicate predicate)
                              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Broadcast the given query on the ring. Then it collects the results and returns them.
        Parameters:
        predicate - the query's predicate
        Returns:
        the results of the query.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • broadcast

        java.util.List<java.lang.Object> broadcast(java.util.function.Predicate predicate,
                                           Node limit)
                                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Broadcast the given query on the ring whitout exceeding the limit passed as a parameter. It collects the results of the query and returns them.
        Parameters:
        predicate - the query's predicate
        limit - the limit for this broadcast
        Returns:
        the results of the query collected from all the nodes to which the query was sent.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • put

        void put(Key k,
         java.lang.Object value)
  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Associates the specified value with the specified key in the ring distributed storage. If the ring previously contained a mapping for the key, the old value is replaced by the specified value.
        Parameters:
        k - key with which the specified value is to be associated
        value - value to be associated with the specified key
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • remove

        void remove(Key k)
     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Removes the mapping for a key from the ring's distributed storage if it is present.
        Parameters:
        k - key whose mapping is to be removed from the storage.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • exec

        void exec(Key k,
          Operation op)
   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Executes the given Operation on the element associated with the specified key in the ring's distributed storage. If no association is found, the value null is passed to the Operation.
        Parameters:
        k - key associated to the value on which executes the operation.
        op - the given operation.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
